paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with LQTS after cardiac arrest following severe vomiting
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Proband-1 carries the novel variant KV11.1–R35W.

functional_data.summary: The variant KV11.1–R35W showed reduced current levels and altered activation kinetics.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.population_frequency: Absent in the 1000 Genomes and Exome Variant Server databases.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is located in the PAS domain affecting deactivation properties.
key_quotes: This residue resides in the so-called Per-Arnt-Sim (PAS) domain that has an impact on deactivation properties of the channel.

individual_records.phenotype_details: had syncopal episodes with auditory stimuli and documented TdP

functional_data.summary: The variant KV11.1–S620G showed complete loss-of-function.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is a de novo mutation.
variants.population_frequency: Absent in the 1000 Genomes and Exome Variant Server databases.
variants.additional_notes: The amino acid residue is conserved across species and plays a role in channel inactivation.
key_quotes: Expression of KV11.1–S620G showed complete loss-of-function for the mutant channel.

individual_records.phenotype_details: history of syncope and family history of LQTS
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In addition, the proband carries a novel variant in KV11.1, V491I.

functional_data.summary: KV11.1-V491I behaved similarly to WT channels.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.population_frequency: Absent in the 1000 Genomes and Exome Variant Server databases.
variants.additional_notes: The variant did not show significant functional differences compared to wild-type.
key_quotes: KV11.1-V491I behaved similarly to WT channels.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were extracted successfully.
